p.d: A nun's body is found at the Dubosc family's funerary chapel. Other than this name and an old missal found on the victim, there's no way to identify her. These scant clues help Arthur and Margot unravel a shady trade in children stolen in Spain in the 1970s. Directed by: Nicolas Herdt (season 2, France, 2016) Screenplay: Lorene Delannoy, Nicole Jamet Cast: Vanessa David (Margot Laurent), Julien Baumgartner (Arthur du Plessis), Christian Rauth (Stavros), Nathalie Blanc (the public prosecutor), Maud Forget (Garnier) Genre: detective
